person.persName: Berryman Hurt (Bath County, Kentucky, farmer and iron worker)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer and iron worker. South Carolina native. Father of Mary W. Hurt and William True Hurt. Married to Elizabeth L. Berry Hurt in Bath County, Kentucky, on May 18, 1846. Father of James G. Hurt, Alice J. Hurt, Julia Hurt, Fannie Hurt, Catharine W. Hurt, Elizabeth L. Hurt, and John S. Hurt. Farmer in Bath County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned ten enslaved persons in Bath County in 1850. Iron worker in Bath County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Bath County in 1860.
